refnamediv.refpurpose: A behaviour interpolating position along an ellipse

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "angle-end" gdouble : Read / Write "angle-start" gdouble : Read / Write "angle-tilt-x" gdouble : Read / Write "angle-tilt-y" gdouble : Read / Write "angle-tilt-z" gdouble : Read / Write "center" ClutterKnot* : Read / Write "direction" ClutterRotateDirection : Read / Write "height" gint : Read / Write "width" gint : Read / Write

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ClutterBehaviourEllipse interpolates actors along a path defined by an ellipse.
Note, on applying an ellipse behaviour to an actor its position will be set to what is dictated by the ellipses initial position.

refsect2.title: ClutterBehaviourEllipseClass

listitem.simpara: signal class handler for the ClutterBehaviourEllipse::knot_reached signal

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: ClutterBehaviour* clutter_behaviour_ellipse_new (ClutterAlpha *alpha, gint x, gint y, gint width, gint height, ClutterRotateDirection direction, gdouble start, gdouble end);
refsect2.para: Creates a behaviour that drives actors along an elliptical path with given center, width and height; the movement starts at angle_start degrees (with 0 corresponding to 12 o'clock) and ends at angle_end degrees. Angles >= 360 degrees get clamped to the canonical interval <0, 360), if start == end, the behaviour will rotate by exacly 360 degrees.

listitem.simpara: angle in degrees at which movement starts, between 0 and 360
angle in degrees at which movement ends, between 0 and 360

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_newx ()
refsect2.programlisting: ClutterBehaviour* clutter_behaviour_ellipse_newx (ClutterAlpha *alpha, gint x, gint y, gint width, gint height, ClutterRotateDirection direction, ClutterFixed start, ClutterFixed end);
refsect2.para: Creates a behaviour that drives actors along an elliptical path. This is the fixed point variant of clutter_behaviour_ellipse_new().

listitem.simpara: ClutterFixed angle in degrees at which movement starts
ClutterFixed angle in degrees at which movement ends

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_center ()
refsect2.programlisting: void clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_center (ClutterBehaviourEllipse *self, gint x, gint y);
refsect2.para: Sets the center of the elliptical path to the point represented by knot.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_center ()
refsect2.para: Gets the center of the elliptical path path.

listitem.simpara: location to store the x coordinace of the center, or NULL
location to store the y coordinace of the center, or NULL

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_start ()
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which movement starts; angles >= 360 degress get clamped to the canonical interval <0, 360).

listitem.simpara: angle at which movement starts in degrees, between 0 and 360.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_start ()
refsect2.para: Gets the angle at which movements starts.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_startx ()
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which movement starts; angles >= 360 degress get clamped to the canonical interval <0, 360).

listitem.simpara: An angle, as ClutterFixed, at which movement starts, in degrees, between 0 and 360.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_startx ()
refsect2.para: Gets the angle at which movements starts.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_end ()
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which movement ends; angles >= 360 degress get clamped to the canonical interval <0, 360).

listitem.simpara: angle at which movement ends in degrees, between 0 and 360.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_end ()
refsect2.para: Gets the at which movements ends.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_endx ()
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which movement ends; angles >= 360 degress get clamped to the canonical interval <0, 360).

listitem.simpara: angle, as ClutterFixed, at which movement ends, in degrees, between 0 and 360.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_endx ()
refsect2.para: Gets the angle at which movements ends.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_tilt ()
refsect2.programlisting: void clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_tilt (ClutterBehaviourEllipse *self, ClutterRotateAxis axis, gdouble angle_tilt);
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which the ellipse should be tilted around it's center.

listitem.simpara: tilt of the elipse around the center in the given axis in degrees.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_tilt ()
refsect2.para: Gets the tilt of the ellipse around the center in the given axis.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_tiltx ()
refsect2.programlisting: void clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_angle_tiltx (ClutterBehaviourEllipse *self, ClutterRotateAxis axis, ClutterFixed angle_tilt);
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which the ellipse should be tilted around it's center.

listitem.simpara: tilt, as ClutterFixed, of the elipse around the center in the given axis in degrees.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_angle_tiltx ()
refsect2.para: Gets the tilt of the ellipse around the center in the given axis.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_height ()
refsect2.para: Sets the height of the elliptical path.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_height ()
refsect2.para: Gets the height of the elliptical path.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_width ()
refsect2.para: Sets the width of the elliptical path.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_width ()
refsect2.para: Gets the width of the elliptical path.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_tilt ()
refsect2.programlisting: void clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_tilt (ClutterBehaviourEllipse *self, gdouble angle_tilt_x, gdouble angle_tilt_y, gdouble angle_tilt_z);
refsect2.para: Sets the angles at which the ellipse should be tilted around it's center.

listitem.simpara: tilt of the elipse around the center in X axis in degrees.
tilt of the elipse around the center in Y axis in degrees.
tilt of the elipse around the center in Z axis in degrees.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_tilt ()
refsect2.para: Gets the tilt of the ellipse around the center in Y axis.

listitem.simpara: return location for tilt angle on the X axis, or NULL.
return location for tilt angle on the Y axis, or NULL.
return location for tilt angle on the Z axis, or NULL.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_tiltx ()
refsect2.programlisting: void clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_tiltx (ClutterBehaviourEllipse *self, ClutterFixed angle_tilt_x, ClutterFixed angle_tilt_y, ClutterFixed angle_tilt_z);
refsect2.para: Sets the angle at which the ellipse should be tilted around it's center.

listitem.simpara: tilt of the elipse in degrees, as ClutterFixed, around the center in X axis
tilt of the elipse in degrees, as ClutterFixed, around the center in Y axis
tilt of the elipse in degrees, as ClutterFixed, around the center in Z axis

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_tiltx ()
refsect2.para: Gets the tilt of the ellipse around the center in Y axis.

listitem.simpara: location for tilt of the elipse, as ClutterFixed, around the center in X axis in degrees, or NULL.
location for tilt of the elipse, as ClutterFixed, around the center in Y axis in degress, or NULL.
location for tilt of the elipse, as ClutterFixed, around the center in Z axis in degrees, or NULL.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_set_direction ()
refsect2.para: Sets the rotation direction used by the ellipse behaviour.

refsect2.title: clutter_behaviour_ellipse_get_direction ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the ClutterRotateDirection used by the ellipse behaviour.

refsect2.title: The "angle-end" property
refsect2.para: The final angle to where the rotation should end.

refsect2.title: The "angle-start" property
refsect2.para: The initial angle from where the rotation should start.

refsect2.title: The "angle-tilt-x" property
refsect2.para: The tilt angle for the rotation around center in x axis

refsect2.title: The "angle-tilt-y" property
refsect2.para: The tilt angle for the rotation around center in y axis

refsect2.title: The "angle-tilt-z" property
refsect2.para: The tilt_z angle for the rotation
